definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The crowd was disappointed about the lack of enthusiam from the players.
sentences.chinese: 一些缺乏激情的選手們令觀衆大失所望。

sentences.english: In order to make strong shot, a player must be able to hold racket very hard.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擊球有力，選手必須將拍子抓得非常緊。

sentences.english: But Ryan Reser of the U.S. judo team has never been to the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是這位美國柔道選手以前從來沒有參加過奧運比賽。

sentences.english: Odds have evened between the champions.
sentences.chinese: 爭奪冠軍的兩名選手得勝的機會均等。

sentences.english: An outdoor game in which the players drive wooden balls through a series of wickets using long-handled mallets.
sentences.chinese: 一種遊戲選手通過一系列環繞來打擊一個木頭球。

sentences.english: Grubby - A great player who got great skills in wc3.
sentences.chinese: 一個有着偉大的魔獸技藝的偉大選手。

sentences.english: You may also forward us a list of qualified drivers from your respective countries for our reference.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自貴國傳一份合格選手的名單給我們參考。

sentences.english: The top four seedings are the same as the current world rankings.
sentences.chinese: 前四名的種子選手跟目前世界排名一樣。

sentences.english: China wins ping- pong mixed doubles.
sentences.chinese: 中國選手贏得了乒乓混合雙打。

sentences.english: The downhill course measured 200m and competitors reached speeds of up to 25km per hour, the organizer said.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 組織者說，參賽選手的最高時速達到了25公里。

sentences.english: In a matrix, or "round robin" competition, a round allows all contestants in a pool to fight once.
sentences.chinese: 在循環賽中，每一輪允許所有選手均比賽一次。

sentences.english: Competitors are allowed to touch the first hold(s), without leaving the ground with both their feet.
sentences.chinese: 選手在雙腳未離地的情形下，得碰觸起攀點。

sentences.english: Obviously she's a very good player and, you know, she stuck in there.
sentences.chinese: 皮洛科娃是一名非常不錯的選手，她“笑到了最後”。

sentences.english: An official throws the ball in the air as a player from each opposing team jumps to gain possession of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 裁判將球拋向空中，這時雙方的選手通過跳躍來爭球。

sentences.english: "America's Ballroom Challenge" brings some of the best together.
sentences.chinese: “美國國標舞挑戰賽”聚集了其中一些頂極選手。

sentences.english: We picked the perfect top two.
sentences.chinese: 我們挑出了最尖子的兩個選手。

definition: to compete/to take part in a competition
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
